metadata.title: CVE-2023-52573 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: rds: Fix possible NULL-pointer dereferenceIn rds_rdma_cm_event_handler_cmn() check, if conn pointer existsbefore dereferencing it as rdma_set_service_type() argumentFound by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
